Package api.database.repository.association

Interface AssociationRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Association,Integer>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Association,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<Association,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<Association,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Association,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Association>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Association,Integer>
public interface AssociationRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Association,Integer>

  • Method Details

    • deleteEmptyAssociations

      @Modifying @Query(value="DELETE FROM qds_association a\nWHERE a.id NOT IN\n(\n SELECT association_id\n FROM qds_association_change\n)\n", nativeQuery=true) void deleteEmptyAssociations()

    • findAssociationsByObjectTypeId

      @Query("SELECT a\nFROM Association a\nJOIN FETCH a.associationType at\nJOIN FETCH a.object1 o1\nJOIN FETCH a.object2 o2\nWHERE at.firstObjectTypeId = :objectTypeId\nOR at.secondObjectTypeId = :objectTypeId\n") List<Association> findAssociationsByObjectTypeId(@Param("objectTypeId") Integer objectTypeId)

    • getAssociationsByKeys

      @Query(value="SELECT\n a.association_type_id,\n a.object1_id,\n a.object2_id,\n a.id as association_id\nFROM qds_association a\nJOIN (\n SELECT\n unnest(:associationTypeIds) as association_type_id,\n unnest(:object1Ids) as object1_id,\n unnest(:object2Ids) as object2_id\n) keys ON a.association_type_id = keys.association_type_id\n AND a.object1_id = keys.object1_id\n AND a.object2_id = keys.object2_id\n", nativeQuery=true) List<InternalAssociationKeyWithId> getAssociationsByKeys(@Param("associationTypeIds") Integer[] associationTypeIds, @Param("object1Ids") Integer[] object1Ids, @Param("object2Ids") Integer[] object2Ids)
